name: CUBELUKE
description:
Info.
CubeLuke in development, free to download and play. More features in the future!
CubeLuke is an exciting game, you can play it for about 15-50 minutes and after that you kinda rage quit.

What do you have to do ?
In CubeLuke you have a parcour with blocks/obstacles, you will have to make your way around the obstacles to get to the finish. You are a little cube that have sensitive movement, you move fast and some levels you are faster or slower. There are around 8 levels to complete but more will be added. It is just a simple game but it is my first project ever so don't blame :)

HAVE FUN!
